_usage.cursor: Copy mcpServers block into .cursor/mcp.json in your project root
_usage.vscode: Copy mcpServers block into .vscode/mcp.json or user settings

_available_tools: fetch          — Fetch any URL as markdown or JSON
search         — Search the web, get structured results
extract        — Extract structured data with a schema
monitor_start  — Watch a URL for changes
batch_fetch    — Fetch multiple URLs in parallel
map_site       — Discover all URLs on a site
diff           — Compare two versions of a page
summarize      — Summarize a page with AI
qa             — Ask a question about a page
pdf            — Extract content from a PDF URL
reddit         — Get structured Reddit thread data
twitter        — Get tweets from a profile or thread
github         — Get structured GitHub repo/issue data
